General.Name: Global Standard Technology Limited
General.Description: Global Standard Technology, Limited operates in the environmental and energy industry. It offers burn, plasma wet, wet, and dry type exhaust management systems; and step control, re-circulating, electric, integration, and cryogenic type thermal management systems. The company was formerly known as GST and changed its name to Global Standard Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2002. Global Standard Technology, Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
